mapper.insert: insert into class (name, rate, origin, description, video_url, post_url, likes, comments_num, watch_num,class_type)values (#{name},#{rate},#{origin}, #{description}, #{video_url}, #{post_url}, #{likes}, #{comments_num}, #{watch_num},#{class_type})
mapper.select: select video_url from class where id=#{id}
select post_url from class where id=#{id}
mapper.update: update class set comments_num=comments_num+1 where id=#{id}
update class set likes=likes+1 where id=#{id}
